Package eg.projects

Class SettingsWindow.InputOptionsBuilder

java.lang.Object
eg.projects.SettingsWindow.InputOptionsBuilder
Enclosing class:
SettingsWindow
public static class SettingsWindow.InputOptionsBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
The building of the content of SettingsWindow with selectable input options.

Is created in the enclosing SettingsWindow

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    SettingsWindow.InputOptionsBuilder addBuildNameInput​(java.lang.String label)
    Adds the option to enter a build name and sets the label for the corresponding text field
    SettingsWindow.InputOptionsBuilder addCmdArgsInput()
    Adds the option to enter command arguments
    SettingsWindow.InputOptionsBuilder addCmdOptionsInput()
    Adds the option to enter command options
    SettingsWindow.InputOptionsBuilder addCompileOptionInput​(java.lang.String label)
    Adds the option to enter a compile option and sets the label for the corresponding text field
    SettingsWindow.InputOptionsBuilder addExecDirInput()
    Adds the option to enter a name of an executables directory
    SettingsWindow.InputOptionsBuilder addExtensionsInput​(java.lang.String label)
    Adds the option to enter file extensions and sets the label for the corresponding text field
    SettingsWindow.InputOptionsBuilder addFileInput​(java.lang.String label)
    Adds the option to enter a name for a main project file and sets the label for the corresponding text field
    SettingsWindow.InputOptionsBuilder addLibrariesInput​(java.lang.String label)
    Adds the option to enter libraries
    SettingsWindow.InputOptionsBuilder addSourceDirInput()
    Adds the option to enter a name for a sources directory
    void buildWindow()
    Builds the window content of SettingsWindow.

    • buildWindow

      public void buildWindow()
      Builds the window content of SettingsWindow.

      If none of the methods to add input options has been invoked the window shows only the field to enter the name of a root directory of a project.
